name: productboard
description: Productboard is a product management platform that gathers feedback, prioritizes features, and aligns roadmaps based on customer insights and strategic goals

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_ADD_NOTE_FOLLOWERS
tools.description: Tool to add multiple followers to a Productboard note. Use when you need to bulk-add existing users as followers to a specific note by their email addresses.

inputSchema.title: AddNoteFollowersRequest

emails.title: Emails
emails.description: List of email addresses of existing users to add as followers

noteId.title: Note Id
noteId.description: UUID of the note to which followers will be added

inputSchema.description: Request model for adding multiple followers to a note by email.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_ADD_NOTE_TAG
tools.description: Tool to add a tag to a Productboard note. Use when categorizing a note after review; creates the tag if missing.

inputSchema.title: AddNoteTagRequest

noteId.title: Note Id
noteId.description: ID of the note to which the tag will be added

tagName.title: Tag Name
tagName.description: Name of the tag to add (will be created if it does not exist)

inputSchema.description: Request model for adding a tag to a Productboard note.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_COMPANY
tools.description: Tool to create a new company in Productboard. Use when you need to add a company record after gathering its details and optional metadata.

name.title: Name
name.description: Primary name of the company to create.

source.title: Source

record_id.title: Record Id
record_id.description: External system's unique record identifier for this company.

source.description: Metadata about the external origin of this company record.

description.title: Description
examples: A leading provider of AI solutions.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_COMPANY_FIELD
tools.description: Tool to create a new custom field for companies. Use when you need to define custom company attributes in Productboard after confirming the field schema.

inputSchema.title: CreateCompanyFieldRequest

body.title: Body
body.description: JSON body containing the custom field definition as per Productboard API schema

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new custom field for companies in Productboard.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_COMPONENT
tools.description: Tool to create a new (sub)component under a product or component. Use after determining the parent component ID.

name.title: Name
name.description: Display name for the new component

component.title: Component

id.title: Id
id.description: UUID of the parent component under which to create the new component

component.description: Wrapper for the parent component identifier

description.title: Description
examples: Shared UI components for mobile and web
description.description: Rich-text or HTML description of the component

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_NOTE
tools.description: Tool to create a new note in Productboard. Use when you need to programmatically add a user or customer note to Productboard.

user.title: User

email.title: Email
email.description: Email of the user to attribute the note to.

user.description: User object containing the email to attribute the note to. Either user.email or customer_email must be provided.

source.title: Source

record_id.title: Record Id
record_id.description: Identifier of the record in the originating system.

source.description: Source object containing origin and record_id of the originating system.

company.title: Company
company.description: Company object to associate with the note; structure should match Productboard's company schema.

display_url.title: Display Url
display_url.description: URL linked from the note’s title.

customer_email.title: Customer Email
customer_email.description: Email to attribute the note to a customer.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_NOTE_LINK
tools.description: Tool to create a link between a note and an entity. Use when associating a note with a productboard entity.

noteId.title: Note Id
noteId.description: UUID of the note to link

entityId.title: Entity Id
entityId.description: UUID of the entity (product, component, feature, or subfeature) to link

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_CREATE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Tool to create a new webhook subscription. Use when you need to register a public endpoint to receive webhooks from Productboard.

url.title: Url
url.description: Public URL where Productboard will send the subscriptionProbe (GET) and webhookNotification (POST) callbacks.

name.title: Name
name.description: Human-readable name for the webhook subscription.

events.title: Events
events.description: List of events to subscribe to, each with eventType. Examples: insight.created, release.updated, key-result.updated, key-result.deleted.

notification_headers.title: NotificationHeaders

authorization.title: Authorization
authorization.description: Authorization header value Productboard will include in callbacks.

notification_headers.description: Optional headers Productboard will include when sending callbacks.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_COMPANY
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific company. Use when you have confirmed the company ID and need to remove it from Productboard.

inputSchema.title: DeleteCompanyRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the company to delete

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a company.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_COMPANY_FIELD
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific company custom field. Use after confirming the field ID and ensuring no dependencies remain.

inputSchema.title: DeleteCompanyFieldRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the company custom field to delete

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a company custom field.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_FEATURE
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific feature. Use when you have confirmed the feature ID and deleted its subfeatures before removal.

inputSchema.title: DeleteFeatureRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: UUID of the feature to delete; ensure subfeatures are deleted first

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a feature.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_NOTE
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific note. Use when you have confirmed the note ID and need to remove it from Productboard.

inputSchema.title: DeleteNoteRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the note to delete

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a note.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_NOTE_TAG
tools.description: Tool to remove a tag from a Productboard note. Use when you need to detach a specific tag from a note after tagging.

inputSchema.title: DeleteNoteTagRequest

noteId.title: Note Id
noteId.description: ID of the note from which to remove the tag

tagName.title: Tag Name
tagName.description: Name of the tag to remove

inputSchema.description: Request model for removing a tag from a Productboard note.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_DELETE_USER
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific user. Use when you have confirmed the user ID and need to remove it from Productboard.

inputSchema.title: DeleteUserRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: ID of the user to delete

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a user.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_COMPANIES
tools.description: Tool to list companies. Use when you need a paginated list of companies with optional filters.

inputSchema.title: ListCompaniesRequest

term.title: Term
term.description: Filter companies by name search term.

hasNotes.title: Has Notes
hasNotes.description: "true" returns only companies with notes; "false" returns only companies without notes.

featureId.title: Feature Id
featureId.description: Filter companies associated with the specified feature ID.

pageOffset.title: Page Offset
pageOffset.description: Offset token for the next page; default is 0. Use the returned offset from a previous response to iterate.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing companies.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_COMPANY_FIELDS
tools.description: Tool to list company custom fields. Use when you need to retrieve all custom field definitions for companies after authentication.

inputSchema.title: ListCompanyFieldsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for listing company custom fields. No parameters required.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_COMPONENTS
tools.description: Tool to list productboard components. Use when you need to retrieve components in a paginated form. Follow 'links.next' for additional pages.

inputSchema.title: ListComponentsRequest

page_limit.title: Page Limit
page_limit.description: Maximum number of components to return (maps to 'pageLimit').

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing components.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_CUSTOM_FIELDS
tools.description: Tool to list custom field definitions for hierarchy entities. Use after determining which field types to filter.

inputSchema.title: ListCustomFieldsRequest

type.title: Type
type.description: One or more custom field types to include; filters which custom field definitions are returned.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing custom field definitions.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_CUSTOM_FIELD_VALUES
tools.description: Tool to list non-empty custom field values. Use when you need to fetch set values across custom fields with optional filtering by type or field ID. Paginate using links.next if more results exist.

inputSchema.title: ListCustomFieldValuesRequest

type.title: Type
type.description: Filter by custom field type(s). Possible values: 'text', 'number', etc. Provide a list for multiple types. Required if customFieldId is not provided.

customField.id.title: Custom Field.Id
customField.id.description: Filter by custom field (column) ID. Required if type is not provided.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing non-empty custom field values with optional filters.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEATURE_INITIATIVES
tools.description: Tool to list initiatives linked to a given feature. Use when you need to retrieve all initiatives associated with a feature after confirming its ID.

inputSchema.title: ListFeatureInitiativesRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: UUID of the feature to list its linked initiatives

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing initiatives linked to a feature.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEATURE_OBJECTIVES
tools.description: Tool to list objectives linked to a feature. Use when you need to retrieve all objectives connected to a given feature after confirming the feature ID.

inputSchema.title: ListFeatureObjectivesRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: UUID of the feature whose linked objectives to list

pageCursor.title: Page Cursor
pageCursor.description: Cursor token from the previous page's links.next for pagination

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing objectives linked to a feature.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEATURE_RELEASE_ASSIGNMENTS
tools.description: Tool to list feature–release assignments. Use when you need to retrieve assignments for a specific feature or release with optional state or date filters; paginate using links.next.

inputSchema.title: ListFeatureReleaseAssignmentsRequest

feature.id.title: Feature.Id
feature.id.description: ID of the feature to filter by.

release.id.title: Release.Id
release.id.description: ID of the release to filter by.

release.state.title: Release.State
release.state.description: Filter assignments by release state (e.g., planned, active, closed).

release.timeframe.endDate.to.title: Release.Timeframe.End Date.To
release.timeframe.endDate.to.description: Filter assignments whose release end date is on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

release.timeframe.endDate.from.title: Release.Timeframe.End Date.From
release.timeframe.endDate.from.description: Filter assignments whose release end date is on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing feature release assignments with optional filters.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEATURES
tools.description: Tool to list features and subfeatures. Use when you need a paginated list of all features in Productboard.

inputSchema.title: ListFeaturesRequest

pageLimit.title: Page Limit
pageLimit.description: Maximum number of features to return per page (default is 100)

pageOffset.title: Page Offset
pageOffset.description: Offset token for pagination (default is 0). Use the returned pageOffset to iterate.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing features and subfeatures.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEATURE_STATUSES
tools.description: Tool to list feature statuses. Use when you need to retrieve all feature status records in a paginated form. Follow 'links.next' for additional pages.

inputSchema.title: ListFeatureStatusesRequest

next_page_url.title: Next Page Url
next_page_url.description: Full URL for the next page of feature statuses; if omitted, the first page at '/feature-statuses' will be fetched

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing feature statuses.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_FEEDBACK_FORM_CONFIGURATIONS
tools.description: Tool to list feedback form configurations. Use when you need a paginated list of feedback form configurations.

inputSchema.title: ListFeedbackFormConfigurationsRequest

pageLimit.title: Page Limit
pageLimit.description: Page size; default is 100. Must be ≥ 1.

pageOffset.title: Page Offset
pageOffset.description: Offset token for the next page; default is 0. Use the returned offset from a previous response to iterate.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing feedback form configurations.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_INITIATIVES
tools.description: Tool to list initiatives. Use when you need a paginated list of initiatives with optional filters.

inputSchema.title: ListInitiativesRequest

archived.title: Archived
archived.description: Filter by archived status: 'true' returns only archived initiatives, 'false' returns only unarchived initiatives.

owner.email.title: Owner.Email
owner.email.description: Filter initiatives by the owner's email address.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing initiatives.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_JIRA_INTEGRATIONS
tools.description: Tool to list Jira integrations. Use when you need to retrieve Productboard's connected Jira integrations with optional pagination.

inputSchema.title: ListJiraIntegrationsRequest

pageUrl.title: Page Url
pageUrl.description: URL for the next page, obtained from the previous response's links.next. If not set, the first page of integrations is returned.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing Jira integrations.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_KEY_RESULTS
tools.description: Tool to list key results. Use when you need a paginated list of key results.

inputSchema.title: ListKeyResultsRequest

archived.title: Archived
archived.description: Filter by whether key results are archived.

parent.id.title: Parent.Id
parent.id.description: Filter by the ID of the parent entity.

owner.email.title: Owner.Email
owner.email.description: Filter by the email of the owning user.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing key results.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_NOTES
tools.description: Tool to list notes in Productboard. Use when you need to retrieve notes with optional filters and pagination. Follow links.next for additional pages.

inputSchema.title: ListNotesRequest

last.title: Last
last.description: Relative time window (e.g., '6m', '10d', '24h'); cannot combine with createdFrom/createdTo.

anyTag.title: Any Tag
anyTag.description: Notes having any of the specified tags; cannot combine with allTags.

dateTo.title: Date To
dateTo.description: (Deprecated) Use createdTo instead; cannot combine with last.

source.title: Source
source.description: Filter notes from a specific source origin.

allTags.title: All Tags
allTags.description: Notes having all specified tags; cannot combine with anyTag.

dateFrom.title: Date From
dateFrom.description: (Deprecated) Use createdFrom instead; cannot combine with last.

companyId.title: Company Id
companyId.description: Filter notes associated with this company UUID.

createdTo.title: Created To
createdTo.description: ISO date string to filter notes created up to this time; cannot combine with last.

featureId.title: Feature Id
featureId.description: Filter notes linked to this feature UUID.

updatedTo.title: Updated To
updatedTo.description: ISO date string to filter notes updated up to this time.

pageCursor.title: Page Cursor
pageCursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results.

createdFrom.title: Created From
createdFrom.description: ISO date string to filter notes created since this time; cannot combine with last.

updatedFrom.title: Updated From
updatedFrom.description: ISO date string to filter notes updated since this time.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing notes with optional pagination and filters.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_OBJECTIVES
tools.description: Tool to list objectives from Productboard. Use when you need a paginated list of objectives with optional filters; follow 'links.next' to retrieve additional pages.

inputSchema.title: ListObjectivesRequest

owner.email.title: Owner.Email
owner.email.description: Filter by the owner's email address.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing objectives with optional filters.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_PLUGIN_INTEGRATIONS
tools.description: Tool to list plugin integrations. Use when you need a paginated list of plugin integrations.

inputSchema.title: ListPluginIntegrationsRequest

pageUrl.title: Page Url
pageUrl.description: URL for the next page, obtained from the previous response's links.next. If not set, the first page of integrations is returned.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing plugin integrations. Supports optional pagination via links.next.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_PRODUCTS
tools.description: Tool to list all products in a workspace. Use when you need to retrieve paginated product details.

inputSchema.title: ListProductsRequest

pageLimit.title: Page Limit
pageLimit.description: Maximum number of products to return per page (default is 100).

pageOffset.title: Page Offset
pageOffset.description: Offset token for pagination (default is 0). Use the returned pageOffset to iterate.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing products.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_RELEASE_GROUPS
tools.description: Tool to list release groups. Use when you need a paginated list of release groups. Returns first page of results and link to next page.

inputSchema.title: ListReleaseGroupsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing release groups. No parameters required.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_RELEASES
tools.description: Tool to list all releases in Productboard. Use when you need a paginated list of releases; follow links.next for more pages.

inputSchema.title: ListReleasesRequest

releaseGroup.id.title: Release Group.Id
releaseGroup.id.description: UUID of a release group to filter releases by.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing releases.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_LIST_USERS
tools.description: Tool to list users. Use when you need a paginated list of all users in Productboard.

inputSchema.title: ListUsersRequest

next.title: Next
next.description: Full URL to the next page of results. If provided, this URL will be called directly; otherwise the /users endpoint is used.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing users.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_REMOVE_NOTE_FOLLOWER
tools.description: Tool to remove a follower from a Productboard note. Use after confirming the note ID and follower email are correct.

inputSchema.title: RemoveNoteFollowerRequest

email.title: Email
email.description: Email address of the follower to remove

noteId.title: Note Id
noteId.description: UUID of the note from which to remove the follower

inputSchema.description: Request model for removing a follower from a note.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_COMPANY
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific company. Use when you have the company ID to fetch its full details.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveCompanyRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the company to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific company.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_COMPANY_FIELD
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific company custom field. Use when you have the custom field ID and need its metadata.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveCompanyFieldRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: UUID of the company custom field to retrieve

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a company custom field.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_COMPANY_FIELD_VALUE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific company custom field value. Use when you need the current value of a custom field for a given company by its IDs.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveCompanyFieldValueRequest

companyId.title: Company Id
companyId.description: ID of the company to retrieve the custom field value for

companyCustomFieldId.title: Company Custom Field Id
companyCustomFieldId.description: ID of the company custom field to retrieve

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving the value of a specific company custom field.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_FEATURE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific feature. Use when you need complete info on one feature.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveFeatureRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: UUID of the feature to retrieve

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for retrieving a specific feature.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_NOTE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific note. Use when you have the note ID to fetch its full details.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveNoteRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: UUID of the note to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific note.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_PRODUCT
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific product. Use when you have the product ID to fetch its full details.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveProductRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the product to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific product.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_RETRIEVE_USER
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific user. Use when you have the user ID to fetch its full details.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveUserRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the user to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific user.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_SCIM_LIST_USERS
tools.description: Tool to list users via SCIM. Use when checking for existing users before creation.

inputSchema.title: ScimListUsersRequest

count.title: Count
count.description: Number of items to return for pagination.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter expression; supports 'eq' and 'and' on attributes id, externalId, userName, displayName, title, active.

sortBy.title: Sort By
sortBy.description: Attribute to sort by; one of id, externalId, userName, displayName, title, active.

startIndex.title: Start Index
startIndex.description: 1-based index for pagination; the first item is 1.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing SCIM v2 users in Productboard.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_SET_COMPANY_FIELD_VALUE
tools.description: Tool to set or replace a specific company custom field's value. Use when you need to update a company's custom field after confirming the field ID and ensuring the new value matches the field type.

inputSchema.title: SetCompanyFieldValueRequest

value.title: Value
value.description: New custom field value. Must match the field type: string for text fields or number for number fields.

companyId.title: Company Id
companyId.description: UUID of the company to update.

companyCustomFieldId.title: Company Custom Field Id
companyCustomFieldId.description: UUID of the company custom field to set.

inputSchema.description: Request model for setting or replacing a specific company custom field's value.

tools.name: PRODUCTBOARD_SET_CUSTOM_FIELD_VALUE
tools.description: Tool to set a custom field value on a hierarchy entity. Use when you need to update a product, component, or feature field with a specific value after confirming the field and entity IDs.

inputSchema.title: SetCustomFieldValueRequest

value.title: Value
value.description: Value to assign to the custom field. Must match the field type (e.g., string, number, single-select key, list of keys for multi-select).

customField.id.title: Custom Field.Id
customField.id.description: UUID of the custom field to set on the hierarchy entity.

hierarchyEntity.id.title: Hierarchy Entity.Id
hierarchyEntity.id.description: UUID of the hierarchy entity (product, component, or feature) to update.

inputSchema.description: Request model for setting a custom field value on a hierarchy entity.
